0.3.name: wordpress/dw2wp
0.3.description: With this plugin you can include your DokuWiki installation in a Wordpress static page. Configure the location of your DokuWiki installation under options. To include your DokuWiki installation create a static page and insert with ns beeing a namespace and page the pagename to show at the beginning.
